name: Message From Beyond the Veil
desc: When entering battle, if the team has 2 or more characters following the Path of Erudition, then increases all allies' CRIT DMG by #1[i]%, calculates at least #2[i] targets when the Trace "Aloofly Honest" calculates hit targets, applies #3[i] stack(s) of "Interpretation" to the target that has the highest current "Interpretation" stacks among the hit enemy targets after attacking, and additionally applies #4[i] stack(s) of "Interpretation" if the attacker is a character following the Path of Erudition.
